mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, create_time AS createTime, limit_time AS limitTime, price AS price, start_price AS startPrice, present_price AS presentPrice, highestbidder_id AS highestBidderId, sale_status AS bidStatus, seller_id AS sellerId, item_id AS itemId FROM bid WHERE id = LAST_INSERT_ID()

SELECT id, create_time AS createTime, limit_time AS limitTime, price AS price, start_price AS startPrice, present_price AS presentPrice, highestbidder_id AS highestBidderId, sale_status AS bidStatus, seller_id AS sellerId, item_id AS itemId FROM bid WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT b.id AS id, b.create_time AS createTime, b.limit_time AS limitTime, b.price AS price, b.start_price AS startPrice, b.present_price AS presentPrice, b.highestbidder_id AS highestBidderId, b.sale_status AS bidStatus, b.item_id AS itemId FROM bid b JOIN item i ON b.item_id = i.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND #{minLevel} < i.equipment_level
AND #{maxLevel} > i.equipment_level
AND #{maxPrice} > b.price
AND #{minFirstProperty} < i.first_property
AND #{minSecondProperty} < i.second_property
AND #{itemRating} = i.rating
AND #{mainCategory} = i.main_type
AND #{subCategory} = 1.sub_type
ORDER BY i.name
ORDER BY b.limit_time
ORDER BY b.present_price
ORDER BY b.price
DESC
ASC
LIMIT #{limitPage} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE bid AS b JOIN item AS i ON b.item_id = i.id COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci JOIN user AS seller ON b.seller_id = seller.user_id COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci SET i.user_id = #{userInfo.id}, seller.gold = seller.gold + b.price, b.highestbidder_id = #{userInfo.userId}, b.sale_status = 'SOLD_OUT' WHERE b.id = #{bid.id} AND b.limit_time > NOW() AND b.sale_status = 'SALE';
